sentences.sContent: These glasses make me look like a freak.
sentences.sCn: 我戴这副眼镜看上去像个怪人。

sentences.sContent: Women who studied engineering used to be considered freaks.
sentences.sCn: 学工程的女性过去常被视为怪物。

synos.tran: 怪人，怪事；畸形人；反复无常

phrases.pCn: 使处于极度兴奋中；崩溃
喜欢控制一切的人；对控制上瘾者
特殊事件；不寻常的事故

words.tran: 畸形的；捉摸不定的（等于freakish）
畸形的；奇特的；朝三暮四的；异想天开的

trans.tranCn: 怪人，怪事；畸形人；反复无常
trans.tranOther: someone who is considered to be very strange because of the way they look, behave, or think
